title: Quantifying Uncertainty in Machine Learning-Based Pervasive Systems: Application to Human Activity Recognition
summary: The recent convergence of pervasive computing and machine learning has given rise to numerous services, impacting almost all areas of economic and social activity. However, the use of AI techniques precludes certain standard software development practices, which emphasize rigorous testing to ensure the elimination of all bugs and adherence to well-defined specifications.
